user.title: Front End Developer JavaScript | TypeScript | React | Styled-components | HTML5 | CSS3

about.title: Hi, my name is Aline
about.description: and I am very excited to share my journey to the Kenzie Academy. Since I was a child, I have always been passionate about math and problem-solving, which led me to stand out in two Brazilian math Olympiads and to be a scholarship holder in the National High School Exam (ENEM).

about.title: During my adolescence
about.description: I had to deal with many personal and family challenges, but I always maintained my passion for math and technology. This passion led me to seek jobs in areas that required problem-solving skills and proactivity, which led me to work  in the construction industry.

about.title: After graduating in Civil Engineering
about.description: I worked for six years in the construction industry, but I felt that something was missing in my career. That's when I realized that my true passion was in technology and programming, areas that have always fascinated me. I started studying programming on my own, learning about HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I quickly realized that I had found my true calling.

about.title: That's how I discovered the Kenzie Academy
about.description: a Full Stack technology school that provides training for those who want to become web developers. I am thrilled to be part of the Kenzie community and have the opportunity to learn from experienced professionals.

about.title: I am very excited to join a company
about.description: that values technology and innovation, where I can apply my problem-solving, time management, and organizational skills. And for me, it is important to work for a company that shares my values of ethics, diversity, and inclusion. I am ready to continue my journey as a web developer and contribute to the success of the company I choose to work for.
